parameter.name: sinceID
parameter.description: The ID of the user for whom to return results for.

parameter.name: maxID
parameter.description: The screen name of the user for whom to return results for.

parameter.name: count
parameter.description: The response from the API will include a previous_cursor and next_cursor to allow paging back and forth

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Many programming environments will not consume our Tweet ids due to their size. Provide this option to have ids returned as strings instead

parameter.name: includeEntities
parameter.description: The number of users to return per page, up to a maximum of 200. Defaults to 20.
